Government

9
1
1
2

  1. Waller City Council

    Page for the Waller City Council — includes meeting information, councilmember listings, and civic governance details.

  2. Waller Economic Development

    Waller Economic Development Corporation (WEDC) — appointed board overseeing the city’s efforts to retain and attract regional, national, and international businesses via funding and incentives.

  3. Agendas & Minutes

    Easily find and search for agendas and minutes from various boards, commissions, and committees.

  4. Code of Ordinances

    Visit the Code of Ordinances

  5. Elections Information

    Elections Are Held on the First Saturday in May to Elect City Council Members and Mayor for Two‑Year Terms; Early Voting Precedes, Candidate Filing Is Through the City Secretary, and the Election Is Administered Via Waller County.
